text: Hi I'm new here work for a BNPL company & am looking to integrate our app into HubSpot. Currently going thru integration related docs. Trying to figure out how to CRM cards work & how to set up data sync bw HubSpot & our app.

Hi ^^
I'm Solutions Engineer at Livestorm, working on improving our interconnection with HubSpot.
I'm currently working on building a workflow action. I'm struggling to find documentation on the authentification to fetch a request *from* HubSpot *to* another app. If anyone can help, that would be greatly appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi everyone ! Our company just decided to implement HubSpot for our sales team. Im the main (&only) developer on our team and I'm implementing our software as a private app with HubSpot.
I am new to HubSpot, how can I start learning ?

Start from HubSpot Academy video tutorials. They're short & simple. Then read the corresponding guides for CRM (and CMS). Then play around by creating random Contacts, Companies, Deal etc. with custom properties. Also try defining a Custom Object.
Here's the text guide for <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/understanding-the-crm|CRM API>. You can navigate to APIs for specific objects from sidebar.
I also recommend going to HubSpot academy & watching their free short video tutorials. Search for the tutorial: "Introduction to the HubSpot APIs"
Search for these tutorials as well
